description:
Need a bit of wonder in your school life? This Digital Soundtrack has got you covered with 27 whimsical tunes to study to!

Tracklist:
・ASOVENTURE (Game Ver.)
・Magic Artes Exam Theme
・Ancient Magic Academy Theme
・Mage's Tower Theme
・Skull Prison Theme
・Pyramid Tower Theme
・Tick-Tock Tower Theme
・Dragon's Sanctuary Theme
・Spirit Village Theme
・Great Serpent's Passage Theme
・Grimoire Tower Theme
・Battle Theme
・Boss Battle Theme
・Last Boss Theme
・School Life Theme
・Class Theme
・Sad Event Theme
・Serious Event Theme
・Comical Event Theme
・Happy Event Theme
・Slapstick Theme
・Determined/Urgent Event Theme
・Fia's Theme
・Friendship Theme
・ASOVENTURE (Instrumental)
・MATOUMONOGATARI (Instrumental)
・MATOUMONOGATARI (Game Ver.)
